alert.note: Alert for Henry; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:42PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Spalding and southwestern Henry Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 542 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Sunny Side, or near Griffin, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Griffin, Hampton, Sunny Side, Highland Mills, Experiment, Birdie and Vaughn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
